subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The decisive play with just over a minute left in Game 5 epitomized the Mavericks’ run to the franchise’s second finals and involved four players yearning to cap careers with a title.
snippet: The decisive play with just over a minute left in Game 5 epitomized the Mavericks’ run to the franchise’s second finals and involved four players yearning to cap careers with a title.
